title: sans serif from Grey Barn Creamery website
author: whatsmytype

comments.content:
Apres RE: [http://www.webtype.com/font/apresre-family/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140338/http:/www.webtype.com/font/apresre-family/ "http://www.webtype.com/font/apresre-family/")

They also use Agenda: [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/agenda/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140338/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/agenda/ "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/agenda/")

Can't find an exact match.  
Best I can find: **[Freight Sans Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140338/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Garage-Fonts&ffam=FreightSans%20BookSC%20-%20Regular&fid=7c99b593ef73505059a344e496c79d1a&fsize=60&text=BEEF%20PORK%20EGGS%20RAW%20MILK&wrap=2)**

\*Edit\*: **Apres** suggestion by Ricardo looks better for sure ;)

What Font confirms Ricardo's ID of Apres Re and Agenda as the fonts used on the website.  
Don
